title: Index page

content:
Followed this youtube video Error fixed: could not read from remote repository | Github Error: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p6Bm1ybdwA4 by CodeWithKarma It helped me in creating new SSH keys and then push all the files to the github website. However I am unable to host the website because of DNS issues. CNAME problem and when I worked with github actions it is giving 404 error. Will work on it tomorrow.
The git commands to remember git add . git commit -m “Write you own message” git push origin main
title: Day 3: Github Success but DNS fail

content:
Followed this youtube video How To Make A Hugo Blowfish Website: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-05mOdHmQVc by Ken Harris but there was no description about the Hosting this website.
Got a problem of permission denied problem as my github was linked to other account. Followed this youtube video: [RESOLVED] Github permission denied. The requested URL returned error 403: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RQLoZUW9qwM by CodeEasy. Problem solved.
The project I developed with glowfish didnot connect with github. But what else to do. I have to try again tomorrow.
title: Day 2: Blowfish Theme Success But Github Fail

content: Tried to work with blowfish hugo theme but failed miserably. But what else to do. I have to try again tomorrow. This is my test post for Hugo Glowfish!
